channel.title: CVE Feed for Silicon Labs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Silicon Labs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0972|2024-08-02T05:32:46.351Z -- silicon%20labs -- z%2Fip%20gateway
item.description: Description: A vulnerability in SiLabs Z/IP Gateway 7.18.01 and earlier allows an unauthenticated attacker within Z-Wave range to overflow a stack buffer, leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-4041|2024-08-02T07:17:11.849Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20bootloader
item.description: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow'), Out-of-bounds Write, Download of Code Without Integrity Check vulnerability in Silicon Labs Gecko Bootloader on ARM (Firmware Update File Parser modules) allows Code Injection, Authentication Bypass.This issue affects "Standalone" and "Application" versions of Gecko Bootloader.

item.title: CVE-2023-27882|2024-08-02T12:23:29.948Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server form boundary functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-28391|2024-08-02T12:38:25.157Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server header parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. Specially crafted network packets can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-24585|2024-08-02T11:03:18.943Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-0971|2024-08-02T05:32:46.058Z -- silicon%20labs -- z%2Fip%20gateway
item.description: A logic error in SiLabs Z/IP Gateway SDK 7.18.02 and earlier allows authentication to be bypassed, remote administration of Z-Wave controllers, and S0/S2 encryption keys to be recovered.

item.title: CVE-2023-0970|2024-08-02T05:32:46.345Z -- silicon%20labs -- z%2Fip%20gateway
item.description: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities in SiLabs Z/IP Gateway SDK version 7.18.01 and earlier allow an attacker with invasive physical access to a Z-Wave controller device to overwrite global memory and potentially execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-0969|2024-08-02T05:32:46.368Z -- silicon%20labs -- z%2Fip%20gateway
item.description: A vulnerability in SiLabs Z/IP Gateway 7.18.01 and earlier allows an authenticated attacker within Z-Wave range to manipulate an array pointer to disclose the contents of global memory.

item.title: CVE-2023-3110|2024-08-02T06:48:07.121Z -- silicon%20labs -- unify%20gateway
item.description: Description: A vulnerability in SiLabs Unify Gateway 1.3.1 and earlier allows an unauthenticated attacker within Z-Wave range to overflow a stack buffer, leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-41094|2024-08-02T18:46:11.841Z -- silicon%20labs -- ember%20znet
item.description:
TouchLink packets processed after timeout or out of range due to Operation on a Resource after Expiration and Missing Release of Resource after Effective Lifetime may allow a device to be added outside of valid TouchLink range or pairing duration
This issue affects Ember ZNet 7.1.x from 7.1.3 through 7.1.5; 7.2.x from 7.2.0 through 7.2.3; Version 7.3 and later are unaffected

item.title: CVE-2023-31247|2024-08-02T14:53:30.224Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server Host header parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-25181|2024-08-02T11:18:36.118Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted set of network packets can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-28379|2024-08-02T12:38:24.954Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server form boundary functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP v3.01.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-45318|2024-07-29T15:07:16.424Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP git commit 80d4004. A specially crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-41093|2024-07-12T19:56:16.225Z -- silicon%20labs -- simplicity%20sdk
item.description: Use After Free vulnerability in Silicon Labs Bluetooth SDK on 32 bit, ARM may allow an attacker with precise timing capabilities to intercept a small number of packets intended for a recipient that has left the network.This issue affects Silabs Bluetooth SDK: through 8.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-22472|2024-06-04T17:52:56.713Z -- silicon%20labs -- z-wave%20sdk
item.description:
A buffer Overflow vulnerability in Silicon Labs 500 Series Z-Wave devices may allow Denial of Service, and potential Remote Code execution
This issue affects all versions of Silicon Labs 500 Series SDK prior to v6.85.2
running on Silicon Labs 500 series Z-wave devices.

item.title: CVE-2023-45318|2024-02-20T18:00:06.767Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the HTTP Server functionality of Weston Embedded uC-HTTP git commit 80d4004. A specially crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-51395|2024-03-07T04:50:54.651Z -- silicon%20labs -- z-wave%20sdk
item.description: The vulnerability described by CVE-2023-0972 has been additionally discovered in Silicon Labs Z-Wave end devices. This vulnerability may allow an unauthenticated attacker within Z-Wave range to overflow a stack buffer, leading to arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-39541|2024-02-20T18:00:11.171Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the ICMP and ICMPv6 parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-TCP-IP v3.06.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to an out-of-bounds read. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns a denial of service within the parsing an IPv6 ICMPv6 packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-39540|2024-02-20T18:00:11.007Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the ICMP and ICMPv6 parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-TCP-IP v3.06.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to an out-of-bounds read. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns a denial of service within the parsing an IPv4 ICMP packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-39540|2024-07-22T16:36:22.424Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the ICMP and ICMPv6 parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-TCP-IP v3.06.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to an out-of-bounds read. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns a denial of service within the parsing an IPv4 ICMP packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-39541|2024-07-22T16:36:45.521Z -- silicon%20labs -- gecko%20platform
item.description: A denial of service vulnerability exists in the ICMP and ICMPv6 parsing functionality of Weston Embedded uC-TCP-IP v3.06.01. A specially crafted network packet can lead to an out-of-bounds read. An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns a denial of service within the parsing an IPv6 ICMPv6 packet.

item.title: CVE-2023-41093|2024-07-30T18:49:50.246Z -- silicon%20labs -- simplicity%20sdk
item.description: Use After Free vulnerability in Silicon Labs Bluetooth SDK on 32 bit, ARM may allow an attacker with precise timing capabilities to intercept a small number of packets intended for a recipient that has left the network.This issue affects Silabs Bluetooth SDK: through 8.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-22472|2024-08-01T22:51:09.827Z -- silicon%20labs -- z-wave%20sdk
item.description:
A buffer Overflow vulnerability in Silicon Labs 500 Series Z-Wave devices may allow Denial of Service, and potential Remote Code execution
This issue affects all versions of Silicon Labs 500 Series SDK prior to v6.85.2
running on Silicon Labs 500 series Z-wave devices.

An attacker can send a malicious packet to trigger this vulnerability.This vulnerability concerns a denial of service within the parsing an IPv4 ICMP packet.
